alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 6:05AM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
